metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

inputs.name: Comment
inputs.value: No records found in HYAS Insight for domain "@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['HostName']}@{items('Looping_through_Hosts_Object')?['DnsDomain']}."

metadata.title: HYAS-Insight-Domain-Current-WHOIS
metadata.description: This playbook uses the HYAS Insight connector to automatically enrich incidents generated by Sentinel with current WHOIS information. You need a valid subscription in order to use the connector and playbook. Learn more about the integration via the [connector documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/connectors/hyasinsight/) or visit [HYAS Insight](https://www.hyas.com/contact) to request a trial key.
